habitat.description: Ochre jellies ooze through dungeon corridors and cave systems, dissolving organic matter with their acidic bodies. They can squeeze through the smallest cracks and are nearly impossible to destroy with conventional weapons.

traits.name: Amorphous
traits.description: The jelly can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.description: The jelly can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

actions.name: Pseudopod
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage plus 3 (1d6) acid damage.

reactions.name: Split
reactions.trigger: The jelly is subjected to lightning or slashing damage
reactions.description: When a jelly that is Medium or larger is subjected to lightning or slashing damage, it splits into two new jellies if it has at least 10 hit points. Each new jelly has hit points equal to half the original jelly's, rounded down. New jellies are one size smaller than the original jelly.
